description: This file contains integration tests for a Spring Boot backend application, using MockMvc and JUnit 5 to verify API endpoints and flows, including user registration, login, log entries, summaries, integrations, activity feed, and analytics.

classes.name: ApiIntegrationTests
classes.description: Contains full-stack integration tests using MockMvc to verify API endpoints related to user management, logs, summaries, integrations, activity, and analytics.

methods.name: initUserAndLogin
methods.description: Initializes a test user by registering and logging in, storing the authentication token.

methods.name: userMe_returnsProfile
methods.description: Tests retrieving the current user's profile information.

methods.name: logEntries_createAndList
methods.description: Tests creating a log entry and retrieving a list of log entries.

methods.name: summaries_generateOrGet
methods.description: Tests generating or retrieving a summary for the current date.

methods.name: integrations_listAndConnect
methods.description: Tests listing available integrations and connecting a new one.

methods.name: activity_feed_and_analytics_daily
methods.description: Tests retrieving activity feeds and daily analytics over a date range.

methods.name: endpoints_requireAuth_whenMissingToken
methods.description: Verifies that API endpoints require authentication by testing access without a token.
